cu.explanation_en: Setting hw_log_level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration parsing errors and prevent proper hardware logging setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting nb_tx to 0 will cause radio unit transmission configuration errors and prevent proper TX antenna setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nb_tx 設定為 0 會導致無線單元傳輸配置錯誤，並阻止正確的 TX 天線設置。
